mapper.select: select a.room_id as statistics_code,a.room_name as statistics_name, count(1) as statistics_total from t_asset a group by a.room_id,a.room_name
select t.course_arrangement_id as statistics_code,'' as statistics_name, count(1) as statistics_total from t_course_arrangement_re_asset t group by t.course_arrangement_id
select t.course_arrangement_id as statistics_code,'' as statistics_name, sum(t.number_of_applications) as statistics_total from t_course_arrangement_re_consumables t group by t.course_arrangement_id
